hero.title: Hey, welcome to my website!
hero.text: I'm Luca. During the week, I'm a Java Software Engineer — but on weekends I'm an adventurer wandering through the Swiss Alps with my camera gear and tent, always chasing new perspectives.

about.subtitle: Java Software Engineer & Mountain Enthusiast · Switzerland

photography.title: Photography
photography.subtitle: A few frames from hikes, road trips, and surf destinations that I’ve visited.

nlp.description: Applying NLP techniques to datasets containing free-text inputs.

webScraper.description: Dynamic web scraping tool for three Swiss e-commerce platforms, focusing on price and product exploration.

videos.title: Videography
videos.subtitle: Travel clips, hikes, and surf sessions that I’ve filmed and edited along the way.

javaSoftwareEngineer.description: Working on backend services with Java and Spring, focusing on clean architecture, testing, performance, and reliable data processing.

masterAppliedDataScience.description: Full-time Master programme while working 80%. Master thesis within SIX Group AG on outlier detection in financial data using machine learning.

graduateProgram.description: Rotational graduate programme at SIX Group AG with assignments in different teams and domains, focused on Java/Spring backends.
